channel.title: Help With Lag
channel.description:
I have a rsps at DezNation
We are having trouble with lag spikes. Sometimes there are disconnects that disconnect the whole server. Sometimes switching too fast will disconnect someone.
Preferably I would like someone with a lot of experience in RSPS coding. Not only coding RSPS, but java itself. If you are interested, please reply here or add me on skype.
My skype is brock-shelton

item.title: Help With Lag
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

Kastro_:

Delete files that you don’t need so things like inactive player files, unused commands.

Clean your base, or add an anti-lagg system.
I would take the first 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Lag
item.dc:creator: @BuhRock BuhRock
item.description:
@BuhRock wrote:

I know that will help a little, but there is something other than that.

Read full topic
